content.title: Mukhyamantri Raut, Charavaaha Evan Doodh Duhane Vaale Saayakal Sahaayata Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Mukhyamantri Raut, Charavaaha Evan Doodh Duhane Vaale Bicycle Sahaayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 10 September 2013. The main objective of the scheme to empower unorganized worker by providing financial assistance.
benefits: Financial Assistance of ₹ 3,000/- per person for bicycle or the rate fixed by CSIDC for bicycle which will be lower
eligibility: Applicant must be registered as an unorganized worker in any district of the state.
Applicant must be between the ages of 18 and 60.
Unorganized workers who are receiving benefits from any other parallel scheme of the State Government are not eligible for the scheme.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Mukhyamantri Raut, Charavaaha Evan Doodh Duhane Vaale Bicycle Sahaayata Yojana' for unorganized worker on 10 September 2013.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme to empower unorganized worker by providing financial assistance.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: Financial Assistance of ₹ 3,000/- per person for bicycle or the rate fixed by CSIDC for bicycle which will be lower.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible registered unorganized labor individuals from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: What is the required age to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be between the ages of 18 and 60.

faqs.question: Is the applicant eligible if he already gets the benefit of Bicycle from any other scheme?
What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Only then applicant can apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How can applicant register under Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Enter the following details, Select Group Name: 'Asangathit Marmakaar Mandal' Select Service: 'Asangathit Shramik Panjikaran' What do you want to do: 'Aavedan' Click next. Check the eligibility criteria for registration in Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board and click next. Fill out the online 'Registration form'. Submit.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Provide the required details. Fill out the application form. Submit.
